video.title: The Increasingly Poor Decisions of Todd Margaret
video.synopsis: This sardonic sitcom focuses on Todd Margaret, a clueless American manager sent to London to promote sales of an energy drink called Thunder Muscle.

episodes.synopsis: Todd Margaret is unexpectedly placed in charge of the launch of a new energy drink in the UK. Todd struggles to make it work.
episodes.title: In Which Claims Are Made and a Journey Ensues

episodes.synopsis: Todd's boss turns up the heat to sell Thunder Muscle, so Todd hatches a plan to crack the British retail market.
episodes.title: A Plan Is Hatched and a Date Is Not a Date

episodes.synopsis: Todd decides to launch Thunder Muscle with an advertisement featuring a celebrity endorsement. Dave sets up the meeting.
episodes.title: The Snooker Player, the Black Canadian, the Turkish Terrorist and the Peanut

episodes.synopsis: Todd's boss arrives in London demanding all of the money from Thunder Muscle sales and Todd oversees the filming of his commercial.
episodes.title: In Which Brent Wilts Arrives and Things Take a Turn for the Worse

episodes.synopsis: Todd initiates a publicity stunt guaranteed to get Britain buzzing about Thunder Muscle.
episodes.title: Where Todd and Brent Misjudge the Mood of a Solemn Day

episodes.synopsis: Todd's world is falling apart; the various calamities he's embroiled himself in are starting to come to a head.
episodes.title: What Can Only Be Considered a Dreadful Day for Todd

episodes.synopsis: Picking up directly where season one left off, Todd has a lot of explaining to do. Trying to talk his way out of trouble, he only makes matters worse.
episodes.title: Todd's Terrible Day Ends and His Next Terrible Day Begins

episodes.synopsis: Todd and Dave decide to take a trip to sell some Thunder Muscle. On the way, they stop at La Molecule, Alice's favorite restaurant.
episodes.title: Todd and His Valet Arrive in Leeds and What They Saw There

episodes.synopsis: High on morphine, Todd mistakes a small teddy bear for Hudson, Alice's former boyfriend, whom he rightly suspects of trying to win her back.
episodes.title: How the Liver and the Salad Conspired to Ruin Todd's Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: Todd seeks solace in a pub, but instead finds himself enmeshed in a night of unimaginable debauchery in a bachelorette party from hell.
episodes.title: In Which Todd Accidentally Learns a Secret and Brent and Doug Get Closer to Further from the Truth

episodes.synopsis: Alice is forced to run from the law when police see the unauthorized liquor license Todd gave her.
episodes.title: The Crime Scene the Storyteller and the Sanctimonious Tower of Morality

episodes.synopsis: Todd is on trial for his life. A number of "friendly" witnesses are called to the stand but each one backfires.
episodes.title: Conclusion
